item.description:
With Halloween almost upon us, I felt strangely compelled to schedule a horror movie meetup . . . so come join me and get in the spirit of the season.

Summary:

After a young, middle class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban "starter" tract house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be somehow demonic but is certainly most active in the middle of the night.

THE DETAILS:
We'll meet outside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change is very much appreciated.

Guests are welcome, but please include them in your RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late; if you need directions; or if you need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (about an hour before we meet). I will email my cell number to all "yes" and "maybe" RSVPs the day of the event.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays for food, drinks and conversation.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Paranormal Activity
